column4: and pandora doesnt load does anyone know why i cant use my browser to wacth videos and if u need more information what would u like me to tell you they just dont loud i either get a sry pandora is taking to long to loud or on another website the video will just be black
is that included in ubuntu restricted extras?
can u help me find a link cause i cant find a link to download a deb
and i use the chrome browser
if you're using chrome, that's a different story.
on the windows and osx chrome programs, flash is automatically maintained and updated by the browser
it automatically updates the flash for you so..i'm not sure why your video isn't working.
that means i just have to wait for an update :(
not necessarily, it could mean there's a setting or something that's not on
ok any idea were i should look im in preferences rigt now
you could try installing flash for another browser, like firefox,

no, you shouldn't have to switch browsers. im just trying to trouble shoot.
